data.name: Volmatic
data.detailed_description:
A revolution in volume control.
Volmatic automatically manages your audio volume to keep it at a constant level, regardless of the levels of the applications you are using.

It constantly monitors the volume levels and adjusts accordingly. If the volume is too low then it will automatically increases it, on the other hand if the sound is too loud then it will decrease it. The best thing is, you don't have to do anything!



With its many customization options, you are certain to find the right setting for you. If you find the default option not to your taste, you can always adjust the sensitivities and duration required for a change in volume.



You can also exclude some of your applications from Volmatic's control. Like Discord or your music player.



At last, you can make Volmatic auto-start with your operating system, allowing you to forget about it and approach multimedia the way it was meant to be experienced:

With constant optimal audio.

data.short_description: Volmatic is the perfect automatic volume controller for your multimedia needs. It has been designed to give you a constant audio experience, no matter the kind of content or file format you are watching. You are no longer forced to adjust the volume every two minutes.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 / Windows 10
  • Processor: a 64 bits potato boiled in salty water
  • Graphics: If you can read this you have what it takes
  • Storage: 62 MB available space
  • Sound Card: yes
  • Additional Notes:
